$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___allTables.description: When ‘true’, all workspace's tables are exported.

___lastModifiedDate.description: Date and time when the export was last modified.

___createdDate.description: The latest data export rule modification time.

___tableNames.description: An array of tables to export, for example: [“Heartbeat, SecurityEvent”].

___name.description: The name of the Log Analytics cluster.

___encryptionKeyUri.description: The Key Vault key or certificate path associated with the Log Analytics cluster.

___resourceId.description: The destination resource ID. This can be copied from the Properties entry of the destination resource in Azure.
